actions.description: The elf makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Longbow

actions.description:
The elf casts the following spell, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
2/day each: teleport
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
